headline.print_headline: Louisiana's Edwards, After Eight Years in Prison, Leads Poll in House Bid
headline.main: Louisiana's Edwards, After Eight Years in Prison, Leads Poll in House Bid

lead_paragraph: Former Louisiana Governor Edwin Edwards, who served eight years in prison for racketeering, leads a crowded field for a November open primary in his bid for a U.S. House of Representatives seat but trails head-to-head against two rivals he could face in a runoff, according to a new poll.
